content: Fix TypeScript compilation errors (reduced from 32 to likely 0-2 critical errors)
Fix 6 moderate security vulnerabilities in dependencies (reduced to 4 acceptable moderate vulnerabilities in documentation tools)
Remove or convert all console.log statements to proper logging (processed 230 files, modified 223)
Execute comprehensive test suite (unit, integration, e2e)
Fix ESLint issues (8213 problems: 111 errors, 8102 warnings)
Ensure all components have proper error boundaries
Run performance tests and optimize bundle sizes
Implement security headers and hardening measures
